name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meetrics: Prepare Excellent Agendas with AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazingly Effective Agendas, Shorter Meetings, Prepared Teams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meetrics is a collaboration software designed to save up to 60% of meeting time, prepare all attendees, and drive meeting outcomes with brilliantly crafted AI agendas.

Eliminate time wasted on bad meetings using Meetrics in Google Calendar. AI-driven, tailored talking points ensure productive, goal-oriented discussions with the right people. Instantly generate structured agendas, assign talking points, and enforce time limits, all within a seamless, intuitive interface.

🎉 [NEW] AI-generated meeting talking points for any meeting and any objective.
With the click of a button, our AI will create brilliant talking points that’ll uplevel the quality of your meetings and help you hit your meeting’s objective. You know that 10-30 *minutes* of meeting prep you just don’t have time for? Yeah, we got that covered for you. 

✨ GOOGLE CALENDAR MEETRICS FEATURES
With Meetrics, you’ll have easy side-bar access to these key features (with even more coming soon!):
  -  🖱️ AI-generated 1-click meeting objectives and talking points
  -  ⏱️ AI-suggested talking point time limits to keep your meeting on track and within time
  -  🙋 AI-suggested talking point owners to share ownership (works if they have Meetrics too)
  -  💌 Automatically share your agenda with your meeting attendees
  -  👍 “Was the objective met?” feedback ratings to see how your meeting went
  -  💯 Meetrics score to objectively show you how you’ve been doing with your meetings over time
  -  👥 Run effective 1:1s, team meetings, and board meetings, with more types to come soon!

🔑 YOUR DATA SECURITY AND PRIVACY ARE #1 TO US
Meetrics follows industry best practices to ensure our product and your data is and always will be secure. Read more about how we do this in our privacy policy: https://www.meetrics.ai/privacy-policy
